content: I do not have the submit button for buddy preferences or the homework. I also cannot download lecture1.zip. I have seen others do have these, but the links don't work for me. I did recently switch into this class though
subject: links not working

content:
Are you're logged in to the website? You can only do so then. There were other students who had the same issue.

Edit. I just gave you access to the website and now you can submit.
